menu_interactionindicator_missing_colorp:
You must install "Color Picker" in order to use the Set Color feature!

You can install it from here: %s
menu_interactionindicator_hud_compatibil: Enable this if this mod is having compatibility issues with other HUD mods such as VanillaHUD+ or MUI.
menu_interactionindicator_indicator_line: Show the indicator line when aiming at an interactable object
Show the indicator line when interacting with an object
menu_interactionindicator_line_w_desc: The size of the indicator line
menu_interactionindicator_line_alpha_des: The opacity of the indicator line
menu_interactionindicator_indicator_dot_: Show the indicator dot when aiming at an interactable object
Show the indicator dot when interacting with an object
menu_interactionindicator_dot_radius_des: The radius of the indicator dot
menu_interactionindicator_dot_alpha_desc: The opacity of the indicator dot
menu_interactionindicator_circle_enabled: Enables the custom interaction circle. Replaces the vanilla interaction circle.
menu_interactionindicator_circle_alignme: Change where to align the interaction circle
menu_interactionindicator_circle_radius_: The radius of the interaction circle
menu_interactionindicator_circle_screen_:
If above zero, bounds the interaction circle so that it is always this many pixels from the edge of the screen.
If set to zero, the circle can go offscreen.
menu_interactionindicator_text_font_size: The size of the timer text
menu_interactionindicator_timer_accuracy: How many places of decimal accuracy the timer has
menu_interactionindicator_timer_show_tot: Displays the total interaction time in the timer text.
menu_interactionindicator_timer_show_sec: Displays the "s" abbreviation after the time value, eg. "1.3s".
